rule_content: Controller layer must not import Dao layer structs directly; must call via Service interface.
Do not perform database queries inside a loop (N+1 problem).
SQL concatenation is forbidden; use parameterized queries (prepared statements).
Do not hardcode secrets (passwords, tokens) in the code.
Interface naming in Go usually ends with 'er' (e.g., Reader, Writer).
Do not ignore errors returned by functions (using '_'); handle them explicitly.
Use sync.WaitGroup or Channels for concurrency; avoid time.Sleep for synchronization.
